title: Kadal Naan Thaan Lyrics Endrendrum Punnagai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kadal naan thaan
Singer(s): Sudha Raghunathan, Suzanne Dâ€™Mello, M.K.Balaji
Movie: Endrendrum Punnagai
Music: Harris Jayaraj
Lyrics: Vaali

Kadal naan thaan, azhai oivadhe illai
sudar naan thaan, velai saivadhe illai
oru thunai illaadhadhu
penmai thuyil kollaadhadhu
unamai thooka kettuthaan,
kannum thaedum unnai

...
idhalaale kadhal kavidhai thaan
unmel ...
ezhudhayo kaali varayil thaan
un angam...
muludhum un paadal varigal thaan

unnai paartha mudhal thadavai
en ulla kadhavai naan thirandhu vitten
udalaagi unnakenave oru uyil ezhudhi
naan irandhuvitten
en thozha un idhalai
en idhalil vaithaal un uyir pilaipen..

en anbae, naan thazhuva nee nazhuva
vittai naan marupadi maruthiduven

thalaivaa un thalaikele
oru thalaganayaai en thodai irukkum
medhuvaai un vizhi thuyila
en valai kulungi mellisai padikkum

angangae pen paravai than siragai
unmeley virikkum
ammaadi un kulirum, en kulirum
illamal nodyinil vilagidumey ..

Kadal naan thaan, azhai oivadhe illai
sudar naan thaan, velai saivadhe illai

...
idhalaale kadhal kavidhai thaan
unmel ...
ezhudhayo kaali varayil thaan
un angam...
muludhum un paadal varigal thaan
